item.title: Starter
item.description: Small business budget? No problem! This solutions gives you access to legal background music that will keep your customers coming back. This plan is for non label music and limited playlists - an entry level option that will act as a loss leader. Description description lorem ipsum dolor sit moose?

item.title: Premium
item.description: The description for the Premium Price Point is to be written and received from Nikky. Will input it here. Get Licensed music with all the bells and whistles, including streaming solutions.

item.title: CUBE Player
item.description: Summary If you are using a phone, tablet, PC or Mac for your music playback, then you face many hidden costs and business risk. Hidden costs range from extra bandwidth to faster replacements of your tablet, to additional IT expenses. If you add up all those hidden costs, do you really arrive at a system that is actually cheaper than a CUBE player? We donâ€™t think so: simply consider what it would cost you to have to replace your tablet every 12 to 18 months.
